title: Underground 1.1
author: kk258966
txt_content:
本帖最后由 kk258966 于 2012-8-31 18:41 编辑 









Rules:don't try to escape the underground with any bugs, tricks or other ways
don't build nether portals in the nether to escape the underground

規則:
不要嘗試利用BUG，等方式離開地底
不要在地獄建造地獄傳送們逃離地底
